languages.text: "Это — тот самый клапан, через который была залита кровь в купальню. Вероятно, там же Орто и убили, после чего приволокли труп на палубу".
"That's the same valve that was used to pump the blood into the bathchamber. That must be where they killed Orto before dragging his corpse onto the deck."
languages.original_text: "Это — тот самый клапан, через который была залита кровь в купальню. Вероятно, там же Орто и убили, после чего приволокли труп на палубу".

traits.locale_text: "That's same the valve that was used to pump blood into the bathchamber. That must be where they killed Orto before dragging his corpse onto the deck."

languages.text: « C'est la valve qui a servi à déverser le sang dans votre cabine de bain. Autrement dit, le coupable a dû tuer Orto là-bas avant de traîner son corps jusqu'au pont. »
languages.original_text: "That's the same valve that was used to pump the blood into the bathchamber. That must be where they killed Orto before dragging his corpse onto the deck."

traits.locale_text: « C'est la valve qui a servi à déverser le sang dans votre cabine de bain. Autrement dit, le coupable a dû tuer Orto là-bas avant de traîner son corps jusqu'au pont. »

languages.text: «Esa es la misma válvula que se usó para verter la sangre en la cámara de baño. Allí debieron de matar a Orto antes de llevar su cadáver a la cubierta».
languages.original_text: "That's the same valve that was used to pump the blood into the bathchamber. That must be where they killed Orto before dragging his corpse onto the deck."

traits.locale_text: «Esa es la misma válvula que se usó para verter la sangre en la cámara de baño. Allí debieron de matar a Orto antes de llevar su cadáver a la cubierta».

languages.text: “他们就是在那个阀门那里，用水泵把血液输送到了浴室。他们肯定是在那里杀害了奥托，之后把他的尸体拖到了甲板上。”
languages.original_text: "That's the same valve that was used to pump the blood into the bathchamber. That must be where they killed Orto before dragging his corpse onto the deck."

traits.locale_text: “他们就是在那个阀门那里，用水泵把血液输送到了浴室。他们肯定是在那里杀害了奥托，之后把他的尸体拖到了甲板上。”

languages.text: 「あれは、血液を浴室に送り込むためのバルブと同じだ。甲板に死体を引きずり出す前に、オルトを殺した場所に違いない」
languages.original_text: "That's the same valve that was used to pump the blood into the bathchamber. That must be where they killed Orto before dragging his corpse onto the deck."

traits.locale_text: 「あれは、血液を浴室に送り込むためのバルブと同じだ。甲板に死体を引きずり出す前に、オルトを殺した場所に違いない」

languages.text: "Das ist das Ventil, über das Blut in das Bad gepumpt wurde. Dort müssen sie Orto getötet haben, bevor sie seine Leiche auf das Deck geschleppt haben."
languages.original_text: "That's the same valve that was used to pump the blood into the bathchamber. That must be where they killed Orto before dragging his corpse onto the deck."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist das Ventil, über das Blut in das Bad gepumpt wurde. Dort müssen sie Orto getötet haben, bevor sie seine Leiche auf das Deck geschleppt haben."

languages.text: "Bu, hamama kan pompalamak için kullanılan vana. Cesedini güverteye sürükleyip getirmeden önce Orto'yu orada öldürmüş olmalı."
languages.original_text: "That's the same valve that was used to pump the blood into the bathchamber. That must be where they killed Orto before dragging his corpse onto the deck."
